definition: lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
(negative prefix)/not/no
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: One hand alone can't clap -- it takes two to make a quarrel.

definition: to use force
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
to go into a huff
affectionate/an affectionate person
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
wordless and silent (idiom); without speaking/taciturn
(of marriage or business partners) to break up (idiom)/to separate
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.)/to have ants in one's pants/hyperactive/adventurous and uncontrollable
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
angry words/sth said in the moment of anger
to lay one's cards on the table
coward/useless scoundrel
